record.description: High-resolution electron micrograph of catalase crystals stained with uranyl formate. Shadowed picture shows fine structure of rows and particles (arrows). Magnification x 446,000.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: See also April/May 1969 issue U of C magazine. Photos taken (possibly) by H. Fernandez-Moran for his monograph on experiments using electron microscopy. UC Mag stamp, mounted on board.
